HDG.FS.content: difficult to accomplish anew what Greeks did when they thought Being as an appearing outside concealment (phusis), still we ask: what occurs in fact of arising-into-alētheia? > the overabundance (Überfülle), the excess (Übermass) of what presences (Anwesende), thus why Thales can only look to the heavens, relation to this thrust of presence is thaumazein [wonder] [height & excess] > in extreme opposition, when astronauts landed on moon, moon as moon disappeared, only a calculable parameter (Rechnungsgrösse) for technological enterprise of humans
HDG.FS.linkedContent: difficult to accomplish anew what Greeks did when they thought Being as an appearing outside concealment (phusis), still we ask: what occurs in fact of arising-into-alētheia? > the overabundance (Überfülle), the excess (Übermass) of what presences (Anwesende), thus why Thales can only look to the heavens, relation to this thrust of presence is thaumazein [wonder] [height & excess] > in extreme opposition, when astronauts landed on moon, moon as moon disappeared, only a calculable parameter (Rechnungsgrösse) for technological enterprise of humans

HDG.FS.content: Being and Time asks not about a being but about “is,” addresses the question from perspective of meaning (Sinnes) of Being > “meaning of being”: understandable on basis (im Ausgang) of “project region” unfolded by “understanding of being” [hermeneutic circle?] > understanding: standing before, residing before (sich aufhalten vor), holding (halten) oneself at height of what stands before, being strong enough to hold out (auszuhalten)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Being and Time asks not about a being but about “is,” addresses the question from perspective of meaning (Sinnes) of Being > “meaning of being”: understandable on basis (im Ausgang) of “project region” unfolded by “understanding of being” [hermeneutic circle?] > understanding: standing before, residing before (sich aufhalten vor), holding (halten) oneself at height of what stands before, being strong enough to hold out (auszuhalten)

HDG.CCP.content: night neighbors the stars, binds together w/out seam, edge or thread [Derrida beyond Heidegger] > neighbors because she works only w/ nearness > wondering upon depths of the height > wonder can open what is locked > by way of waiting > if this is released > and human nature remains appropriated to that > from whence we’re called
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: night neighbors the stars, binds together w/out seam, edge or thread [Derrida beyond Heidegger] > neighbors because she works only w/ nearness > wondering upon depths of the height > wonder can open what is locked > by way of waiting > if this is released > and human nature remains appropriated to that > from whence we’re called
